original_text:
I will cut off the inhabitants from Ashdod,
    and him who holds the scepter from Ashkelon;
I will turn my hand against Ekron,
    and the remnant of the Philistines shall perish,”
says the Lord God.
korean_text: 내가 또 아스돗에서 그 주민들과 아스글론에서 규를 잡은 자를 끊고 또 손을 돌이켜 에그론을 치리니 블레셋의 남아 있는 자가 멸망하리라 주 여호와께서 말씀하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I will cut off the inhabitants from Ashdod
and him who holds the scepter from Ashkelon
I will turn my hand against Ekron
and the remnant of the Philistines shall perish
